remarks: Lemma for ~ cvmlift .  Discharge the assumptions of ~ cvmliftlem14 . The set of all open subsets ` u ` of the unit interval such that ` G " u ` is contained in an even covering of some open set in ` J ` is a cover of ` II ` by the definition of a covering map, so by the Lebesgue number lemma ~ lebnumii , there is a subdivision of the unit interval into ` N ` equal parts such that each part is entirely contained within one such open set of ` J ` .  Then using finite choice ~ ac6sfi to uniformly select one such subset and one even covering of each subset, we are ready to finish the proof with ~ cvmliftlem14 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
